game.name: Cyber Tower 2048
game.shortDescription: Cyber Tower 2048 is an action tower defense game where players fight insectoids by building defenses and developing tactics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cyber Tower 2048 is an action tower defense game where players fight insectoids by building defenses and developing tactics.

reviewHighlights.text: game is sooo slow and its just a boring tower defense, 1/10, only used for scam keys
